feed.title: Category: Hashtags | notes from the sandbox

entry.title: When Hashtags Collide
entry.content:
There are a lot of hashtags out there on Twitter, and most of them are unique, but many aren’t. I have been thinking about how to best figure out what groups are using what hashtags so that collisions can be avoided.

This is a common problem. There are even studies about it: Tweeting Disaster: Hashtag Constructions and Collisions
